channel.title: Making a Command to use against another player
channel.description:
I am using PimpScape and I would like to know how to create a command to like, teleport a player to another place, or turn them into an NPC. Basically, I want to know how to make a command that I can do something like this with: ::(command) (Player's Name)
Example: ::televarrock Harmony
All help appreciated, thanks!

item.title: Making a Command to use against another player
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

btw you want to try to add that under /end of frame testing/ and tell me if you get any errors

Read full topic

item.title: Making a Command to use against another player
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

i came up with this but no garuntee its gonna work and if it dosent i appologize for wasting your time

if (command.startsWith("televarrock") && (playerRights == 3)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); p.TeleToX = coordshere; p.teleToY = coordshere; p.heightLevel = playerHeight; p.sendMessage("you have been teleported to varrock by the owner."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Making a Command to use against another player
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“n0vamage, post:2, topic:83648”]if (command.startsWith("televarrock") && (playerRights == 3)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "televarrock: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to varrock"; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to varrock.."); } }

hope that helps you

`n0va[/quote]Everytime I do the command it ALWAYS says ‘The name doesn’t exist.’ do you know what’s wrong? Or can I just put this in the same section as all my other commands…?

Read full topic

item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

mabey if you added

setPlayerLevel[3] = 0, 3) or somthing[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 05:31:49 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Slave Scyth, post:4, topic:83648”][quote author=n0vamage link=topic=122913.msg1202243#msg1202243 date=1177302344]

if (command.startsWith("televarrock") && (playerRights == 3)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "televarrock: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to varrock"; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to varrock.."); } }

hope that helps you

`n0va
[/quote]Thank you. :)[/quote]

no problem glad to help
